name: Kebab House
description:
Have you ever wanted to know what it feels like to run your own Kebab shop? Do your best to make kebab orders from customers while making enough money to keep your shop open. Upgrade your shop with new toppings and equipment to have more customers inside and online



GAME HIGHLIGHTS
  • Different customers with unique orders and personalities.
  • All kebabs, All Doners, Kofte, Salads. Drinks, and SpecialKebab and more
  • Equipment upgrades to help you become the best kebab shop in the town and help you to take all the customers either inside and online
  • Simple, fun, and challenging cooking gameplay.

Kebab House has been made by formal kebab shop worker everything inside the game coming from real experiences
